name: VR Cops
description:
First release week special offer, Use these weapons as a demo for free:

MK-18
B90
DX11
X94

10.000$ in-game cash stays forever in your account.

This Offer is valid until 19th June, after that only DLC owners have access to those weapons.

Let's talk about VR Cops on my discord:



Are you ready to experience the thrill of realistic gun simulation in VR? In VR Cops, You can customize your weapons with various attachments and accessories, and feel the realistic physics and recoil on the haptic controllers. Each shot and each gun has a different feel and handling in this immersive VR game.
If you are tired of auto-aiming and searching for a truly challenging experience you are at the right place, This is a game where you can level up your shooting skills.
You will also be immersed in a gripping story of a young cop who joins a group of good cops to fight against a group of corrupted cops. You must use your skills and tactics to survive and uncover the truth behind the corruption. Will you be able to restore justice and peace in the city?

The game currently features 26 guns of different types and classes, two guns are free to use (M9 & TAV-21), and the rest are available in DLCs.
You can choose from Rifles, Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns, each with its own characteristics and customization options.




To customize the target board image, follow these easy steps:
1- Open Target.psd in the installed folder location of VR Cops using Photoshop or GIMP.
2- Replace the BG layer with your custom image.
3- Export it as Target.png in the same folder.
